      • Order

        public Order​(int employeeID,
             int tableNumber,
             int numOfCustomers)
        Instantiates a new Order.
        Parameters:
        employeeID - The employee ID of the employee that took the order.
        tableNumber - The table number of the customer.
        numOfCustomers - The number of customers.
